name: The Smallest House (Remake)
description:
While visiting his Aunt and his niece with his family, Max decides to go out on a walk. He goes to a small house that's located in the forest, supposedly, the smallest house in the world. But a simple trip suddenly turns into a huge nightmare. As some say, a house can always have something big awaiting inside...

I'm waiting. Come join me.

===============================================================

This game was made for my October project and made for the RPG Horror Celebration Jam #2! I originally made this project in 2018 or 2019 (I don't remember) but it was never released or completed. I wanted to remake the story since I thought it'd be a fun little horror story. I hope you enjoy it!

Also, please read the warnings and the credit.txt before you open the game! Thank you!
